医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明针灸和按摩是治疗晚期癌症的有效疼痛方法在一项临床试验中，针灸和按摩疗法显着减轻了疼痛、疲劳和失眠，提高了晚期癌症患者 26 周的生活质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/Study-reveals-acupuncture-and-massage-as- effective-pain-management-in-advanced-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/Study-reveals-acupuncture-and-massage-as- effective-pain-management-in-advanced-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3bc7f156-31c9-4193-aca0-21884b8482bc Thu, 16 Nov 2023 00:33:00 -0500 Study reveals acupuncture and massage as effective pain management in advanced cancer
姜黄素促进 HIV 药物的大脑输送，抑制炎症和氧化应激研究表明，姜黄素可以增强抗逆转录病毒的传递，减少艾滋病毒的炎症和氧化应激，从而为治疗艾滋病毒相关的神经认知障碍提供潜在的改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/Curcumin-boosts-brain-delivery-of-HIV-drug-curbing-inflammation-and-oxygen-stress.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/Curcumin-boosts-brain-delivery-of-HIV-drug-curbing-inflammation-and-oxygen-stress.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e308e78a-f4bb-4c72-acb9-9cee09016df3 Thu, 16 Nov 2023 00:16:00 -0500 Curcumin boosts brain delivery of HIV drug, curbing inflammation and oxidative stress
麦地那龙线虫病例接近根除，但动物感染带来新挑战CDC 在 MMWR 上发布的最新报告显示，全球抗击麦地那龙线虫病的斗争取得了重大进展，人类病例到 2022 年将降至 13 例，2023 年上半年仅为 3 例。然而，由于动物感染增加和国内骚乱，挑战仍然存在。受影响的地区。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/Guinea-worm-cases-near-eramination-but-animal-infections-pose-new-challenge.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/Guinea-worm-cases-near-eramination-but-animal-infections-pose-new-challenge.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=92583634-8065-44f5-860f-b9ee3a0234c7 Thu, 16 Nov 2023 00:03:00 -0500 Guinea worm cases near eradication, but animal infections pose new challenge
研究质疑人工甜味剂饮料的健康益处，与增加的健康风险有关《营养进展》中的一项综合综述审查了之前的系统综述和荟萃分析，结果表明，经常饮用人工甜味剂饮料 (ASB) 与肥胖、全因死亡率、高血压、2 型糖尿病和心血管疾病的风险增加相关，挑战了 ASB 作为含糖饮料的更健康替代品的看法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/Study-challenges-health-benefits-of-artificially-sweetened-beverages-links-to-increased-health-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/Study-challenges-health-benefits-of-artificially-sweetened-beverages-links-to-increased-health-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=07f90fde-0553-4b6c-8ccc-172871cfc4ef Wed, 15 Nov 2023 23:42:00 -0500 Study challenges health benefits of artificially sweetened beverages, links to increased health risks
新研究强调血管性认知障碍和痴呆症诊断中迫切需要特定的生物标志物《Nature Reviews Neurology》中的一篇综述讨论了血管性认知障碍和痴呆 (VCID) 的病理生理过程，强调需要特定的生物标志物来区分 VCID 和阿尔茨海默病，并改进诊断和治疗策略，超越对神经影像学和患者病史的依赖。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/New-study-highlights-urgent-need-for-specific-biomarkers-in-血管-认知-impairment-and-dementia-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/New-study-highlights-urgent-need-for-specific-biomarkers-in-血管-认知-impairment-and-dementia-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7a28eac7-2fb3-4e28-979d-677f11ed44d5 Wed, 15 Nov 2023 23:09:00 -0500 New study highlights urgent need for specific biomarkers in vascular cognitive impairment and dementia diagnosis
经常使用大麻会影响运动技能吗？ 《人脑图谱》中的一项研究表明，经常使用大麻会改变运动控制的神经动力学，表明虽然大麻使用者执行任务的准确性和反应时间与非使用者相似，但他们的大脑在任务执行过程中表现出更强的 β-ERD 反应，可能表明代偿性神经机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/Does-regular-cannabis-use-affect-motor-skills.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/Does-regular-cannabis-use-affect-motor-skills.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=81b7ed26-82d4-4fec-b26c-3eb0906bf19d Wed, 15 Nov 2023 22:58:00 -0500 Does regular cannabis use affect motor skills?
粪便微生物群移植可提高转移性​​结直肠癌治疗的生存率eClinicalMedicine 最近的一项研究发现，粪便微生物群移植联合呋喹替尼和替雷利珠单抗可显着提高微卫星稳定转移性结直肠癌患者的生存率，显示出可控的安全性，并且无进展生存率和总生存率显着提高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/Fecal-microbiota-transplantation-boosts-survival-in-metastatic-colorectal-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/Fecal-microbiota-transplantation-boosts-survival-in-metastatic-colorectal-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a39fed18-ded3-4307-858c-3a40e7bd2e4f Wed, 15 Nov 2023 22:43:00 -0500 Fecal microbiota transplantation boosts survival in metastatic colorectal cancer treatment
新疫苗促进免疫调节，治疗自身免疫并延长移植存活期CD8 T 细胞的一种亚型通常被认为可以促进免疫系统反应，实际上可能通过抑制免疫细胞来调节免疫系统，从而导致自我破坏性反应，从而导致自身免疫性疾病和器官移植排斥。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/New-vaccine-promotes-immune-regulation-that-treats-autoimmunity-and-prolongs-transplant-survival.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/New-vaccine-promotes-immune-regulation-that-treats-autoimmunity-and-prolongs-transplant-survival.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=47c7106a-a4b8-4e6c-90f7-17ef6995aeb4 Wed, 15 Nov 2023 22:15:28 -0500 New vaccine promotes immune regulation that treats autoimmunity and prolongs transplant survival
大脑海马区萎缩与认知能力下降有关随着针对大脑中β-淀粉样蛋白斑块（阿尔茨海默病早期症状）的新药物的兴起，需要新的方法来确定记忆丧失和思维问题是否是由阿尔茨海默病或其他神经退行性疾病引起。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/Shrinkage-in-the-brains-hippocampus-area-linked-with-cognitive-decline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/Shrinkage-in-the-brains-hippocampus-area-linked-with-cognitive-decline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3e97f9b-556d-4c9c-9793-111e5dc29c6f Wed, 15 Nov 2023 22:09:06 -0500 Shrinkage in the brain's hippocampus area associated with cognitive decline
研究：7 个国家每年有 130 万人死于吸烟引起的癌症英国癌症研究中心资助的一项新研究显示，在英国、美国和金砖国家（巴西、俄罗斯、印度、中国和南非），每年有 130 万人死于吸烟引起的癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/Study-13-million-lives-lost-every-year-to-cancers-caused-by-smoking-tobacco-across-7-countries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/Study-13-million-lives-lost-every-year-to-cancers-caused-by-smoking-tobacco-across-7-countries.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=44a25be7-7548-4fd8-af0c-0187735bd1e7 Wed, 15 Nov 2023 22:05:25 -0500 Study: 1.3 million lives lost every year to cancers caused by smoking tobacco across 7 countries
